nodes.text: Mairne, situated within the system of the same name, was a planet in the Kathol sector of the Outer Rim Territories. Connected to the neighboring planets of Charis and Gandle Ott by hyperlanes, Mairne was located just off the Trition Trade Route that ran through the sector. By 8 ABY, the world supported a small colony whose economy was based around supplying ore and natural resources to Gandle Ott.

Mairne was featured in The DarkStryder Campaign, a 1995 supplement for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game by West End Games. Mairne was not featured directly in any adventure, but was included to give background information on worlds within the Kathol sector. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Mairne system, and therefore the planet Mairne, in grid square M-21.
